snippet: Fritz Salomon’s schizophrenia was a stigma in his native Haiti, but his studies here are helping him to be independent; he hopes to become a mechanic or nurse.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services helps Fritz Salomon, who suffers from schizophrenia and is taking classes for his high school diploma, pay transportation fees.
lead_paragraph: Fritz Salomon’s schizophrenia was a stigma in his native Haiti, but his studies here are helping him to be independent; he hopes to become a mechanic or nurse.

headline.seo: Battling Schizophrenia, and Hoping to Earn a High School Diploma
headline.main: Deterred by Illness, Driven Ahead by Goals
headline.print_headline: Deterred by Illness, Driven Ahead by Goals

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
